thread.title: Mohamed Salah MISSES another penalty but has his blushes spared after shot crashes off crossbar before hitting the goalkeeper's BACKSIDE to go in - as Liverpool star helps Egypt to a 2-0 win in AFCON warm-up friendly
thread.title_full: Mohamed Salah MISSES another penalty but has his blushes spared after shot crashes off crossbar before hitting the goalkeeper's BACKSIDE to go in - as Liverpool star helps Egypt to a 2-0 win in AFCON warm-up friendly

author: Daily Mail
title: Mohamed Salah MISSES another penalty but has his blushes spared after shot crashes off crossbar before hitting the goalkeeper's BACKSIDE to go in - as Liverpool star helps Egypt to a 2-0 win in AFCON warm-up friendly
text: Back to the Liverpool Newsfeed Mohamed Salah MISSES another penalty but has his blushes spared after shot crashes off crossbar before hitting the goalkeeper's BACKSIDE to go in - as Liverpool star helps Egypt to a 2-0 win in AFCON warm-up friendly Daily Mail | January 7, 2024 Related Topics: Norby Williamson , Pat McAfee , Travis Kelce , Jack Squirek SPORTS Digest Aaron Rodgers is seen for the first time since claiming Jimmy Kimmel would be named on Epstein list Braves the snow to watch Jets in season finale Wrexham's A-List owner Ryan Reynolds and Hollywood pal Hugh Jackman celebrate the Welsh soccer team's 'HUGE' FA Cup win To make fourth round Mary Lou Retton reveals she was almost put on life support and insists she is 'blessed to be here' Was hospitalized with rare form of pneumonia Pat McAfee posts cryptic 'Scarface' clip on social media amid ESPN controversy Claimed executive Norby Williamson is trying to SABOTAGE his show Travis Kelce and the Chiefs touch down in Los Angeles ahead of NFL season finale against the Chargers Where Taylor Swift enjoyed a girls' night out MORE SPORTS STARS McAfee signs autographs for fans at Colts-Texans game as he puts ESPN controversy behind him After claiming exec is trying to 'sabotage' show Fans poke fun at Ravens star Agholor after he fell agonizing 19 YARDS short of season target Would have earned himself a $250k bonus EXCLUSIVE Kelce is seen at a Kansas City Panera Bread drive thru before taking off with his Chiefs teammates to LA Where girlfriend Taylor Swift has been spotted Ex-Las Vegas Raiders star Squirek dead at 64: Team pays tribute to linebacker who touchdown helped them win Super Bowl in 1984 Survived by his wife Dunne wows fans with brand new training video and backstage selfie.
